means: 扭，搓，缠绕( twist的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_cn: 那封信非常清楚地表明了一个变态者的思维方式。

sentence.Network_en: The car was left a mess of twisted metal.
sentence.Network_cn: 车子成了一堆扭曲的金属。

双绞线（twisted pair）（Twisted Pair）是由两条相互绝缘的导线按照一定的规格互相缠绕（一般以逆时针缠绕）在一起而制成的一种通用配线，属于 …

entry.def: If you describe a person as twisted, you dislike them because you think they are strange in an unpleasant way.

example.ex: ...a twisted man who shot at the president...
example.tran: 向总统开枪的一个心理不正常的人

example.ex: The letter showed horribly clearly the workings of a twisted mind.
example.tran: 那封信非常清楚地表明了一个变态者的思维方式。

sentences.sentence: "bulky with twisted stitches around the edges"

means.word_mean: 2. strained or wrenched out of normal shape;
3. having an intended meaning altered or misrepresented;

sentences.sentence: "many of the facts seemed twisted out of any semblance to reality"

Sentence.sentence: Sure I did, but I think they twisted the meaning of what he said.
